00020 using namespace std;
00021 
00022 const int NUM_MODULES = 15;
00023 //modules are actually an enum type contained in "datastructurs.h"
00024 
00025 //class declaration
00026 class Permission
00027 {
00028     public:
00029         Permission(wxString loadAuthCode = "0", wxString loadPermCode = "0");
00030         ~Permission();
00031 
00032         bool isEnabled(int id);     //module-specific permissions request
00033         bool isAuthorized(int id);  //module-specific authorization request
00034 
00035         void enable(int id);        //module-specific enable
00036         void disable(int id);       //module-specific disable
00037 
00038         wxString GetAuthCode() {return(savedAuthCode);}
00039         wxString GetPermCode() {return(savedPermCode);}
00040 
00041         bool setGlobalAuthorized(wxString newAuthCode);//set everything
00042         void setGlobalEnabled(wxString newEnableCode);
00043 
00044         long getGlobalEnabled();    //what should be visible
00045         long getGlobalAuthorized(); //what's allowed to be turned on/off
00046 
00047         //returns the string that matches the enumeration
00048         wxString getPermName(int permEnum);
00049 
00050     private:
00051         bitset <NUM_MODULES> status;//array for holding module status
00052         bitset <NUM_MODULES> auth;  //array for holding what's allowed
00053         long permCode;              //int for holding permissions code #
00054         long authCode;              //int for holding authorized code #
00055         wxArrayString permNames;    //matches the enumerated perms with a name 
00056         wxString savedAuthCode;
00057         wxString savedPermCode;
00058 };
